apiKeysDescription: Manage API keys for integrating DynoPay into your applications

documentation.title: API Documentation
documentation.description: Learn how to integrate DynoPay into your application with our comprehensive API documentation.

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?

security.title: Security Best Practices:
security.description: Keep your API keys secure and never share them publicly. If you suspect a key has been compromised, delete it immediately and create a new one.

withdrawalWhitelist.title: Withdrawal Whitelist
withdrawalWhitelist.description: Once enabled, your account will only be able to withdraw to addresses on your whitelist.
